constraints.name: constraints
constraints.description:
Constraints define relationships between multiple particles or
between particles and geometric primitives.

forces.name: forces
forces.description:
Forces are accumulated and applied to particles, affecting their
acceleration and velocity in the system's integration step.

AngleConstraint.name: AngleConstraint

params.name: angle
params.description: Angle or angle range `[min, max]` between particles

params.name: a
params.description: Particle index or list of many constraint sets

params.name: b
params.description: Particle index (only used if `a` is not an array)

params.name: c
params.description: Particle index (only used if `a` is not an array)

AxisConstraint.name: AxisConstraint
AxisConstraint.description:
Defines one or many relationships between an infinite axis and single particles.

Orientaiton of the axis is defined by 2 points: `axisA` and `axisB`.

```javascript
var axisA = 0, axisB = 1
var a = 2, b = 3, c = 4
var single = AxisConstraint.create(axisA, axisB, a)
var many = AxisConstraint.create(axisA, axisB, [a, b, c])
```

params.name: axisA
params.description: Particle index defining start of axis

params.name: axisB
params.description: Particle index defining end of axis

params.name: a
params.description: Particle index or list of many indices

BoundingPlaneConstraint.name: BoundingPlaneConstraint
BoundingPlaneConstraint.description:
Defines an infinite bounding plane which constrains all particles in the system.

```javascript
var origin = [1.0, 2.0, 5.0]
var normal = [0.0, 1.0, 0.0]
var bounds = BoundingPlaneConstraint.create(origin, normal)
var plane = BoundingPlaneConstraint.create(origin, normal, Infinity)
```

params.name: distance
params.description: Maximum positive distance to affect particles

BoxConstraint.name: BoxConstraint
BoxConstraint.description:
Defines an axis-aligned bounding box which constrains all particles
in the system to its bounds.

```javascript
var min = [-10.0, -10.0, -10.0]
var max = [10.0, 10.0, 10.0]
var box = BoxConstraint.create(min, max)
```

Constraint.name: Constraint
Constraint.description: Base class for defining particle constraints.

params.name: size
params.description: Number of indices to be stored

params.name: itemSize
params.description: Number of particles per constraint relation

params.name: indexOffset
params.description: Number of indices to save at beginning of index array

DistanceConstraint.name: DistanceConstraint

params.name: distance
params.description: Distance or distance range `[min, max]` between particles

params.name: a
params.description: Particle index or list of many constraint sets

params.name: b
params.description: Particle index (only used if `a` is not an array)

PlaneConstraint.name: PlaneConstraint
PlaneConstraint.description:
Defines one or many relationships between an infinite plane and single particles.

Orientaiton of the plane is defined by 3 points: `planeA`, `planeB`, and `planeC`.

```javascript
var planeA = 0, planeB = 1, planeC = 2
var a = 3, b = 4, c = 5
var single = PlaneConstraint.create(planeA, planeB, planeC, a)
var many = PlaneConstraint.create(planeA, planeB, planeC, [a, b, c])
```

params.name: planeA
params.description: Particle index defining point on plane

params.name: planeB
params.description: Particle index defining point on plane

params.name: planeC
params.description: Particle index defining point on plane

params.name: a
params.description: Particle index or list of many indices

PointConstraint.name: PointConstraint
PointConstraint.description:
Defines one or many relationships between a fixed point and single particles.

```javascript
var point = [0.5, 10.0, 3.0]
var a = 0, b = 1
var single = PointConstraint.create(point, a)
var many = PointConstraint.create(point, [a, b])
```

params.name: a
params.description: Particle index or list of many indices

DirectionalForce.name: DirectionalForce
DirectionalForce.description:
Defines a directional force that affects all particles in the system.

```javascript
var gravity = DirectionalForce.create([0.0, -0.1, 0.0])
```

PointForce.name: PointForce
PointForce.description:
Defines a directional force that affects all particles in the system.

```javascript
var repulsor = PointForce.create([0.0, 2.0, 3.0], {
  type : Force.REPULSOR,
  radius : 15.0,
  intensity : 0.1
})
```

ParticleSystem.name: ParticleSystem
ParticleSystem.description: Manages particle state as well as the forces and constraints that act on its particles.

params.name: particles
params.description: Number of particles or array of initial particle positions

params.name: iterations
params.description: Number of constraint iterations per system tick

classitems.description:
Angle used to classify obtuse angles in constraint solver. For accute angles,
only particles `a` and `c` are repositioned to satisfy the particle set's
target angle. For obtuse angles, particle `b` is also repositioned.
classitems.name: ANGLE_OBTUSE

params.name: a
params.description: Particle index defining start of axis

params.name: b
params.description: Particle index defining end of axis

classitems.description:
Positive distance from plane within which particles will be constrained.

A value of `Infinity` will constrain all particles to be inline with the plane, while
the default of `0` constrains all particles to space in front of the plane
relative to its `origin` and orientation `normal`.
classitems.name: distance

classitems.description: Damping factor to apply to particles being constrained to bounds
classitems.name: friction

classitems.description: Vec3 buffer which stores plane origin and normal
classitems.name: bufferVec3

classitems.description: Damping factor to apply to particles being constrained to bounds
classitems.name: friction

classitems.description: Number of constraint relations managed by this instance
classitems.name: _count

classitems.description: Number of particles per constraint relation
classitems.name: _itemSize

classitems.description: Number of indices to save at beginning of index array
classitems.name: _offset

classitems.description: Set particle indices with `Array` or list of `arguments`.
classitems.name: setIndices

classitems.description:
Apply constraint to one set of particles defining a constrint relation.
Called `_count` times per relaxation loop.
classitems.name: applyConstraint

classitems.description: Cached value of minimum distance squared
classitems.name: _min2

classitems.description: Cached value of maximum distance squared
classitems.name: _max2

classitems.description: Vec3 buffer which stores plane normal.
classitems.name: bufferVec3

classitems.description:
Calculate and cache plane normal vector.
Calculated once per relaxation loop iteration.
classitems.name: _calculateNormal

classitems.description: State of constraint's plane normal resolution
classitems.name: _hasNormal

classitems.description: Vec3 buffer which stores point position.
classitems.name: bufferVec3

classitems.description: Apply force to one particle in system.
classitems.name: applyForce

classitems.description: Cached value of squared influence radius
classitems.name: _radius2

params.name: positions
params.description: Number of vectors or array of initial values

return.description: Squared distance from a to b

classitems.description: Accumulated forces currently acting on particles
classitems.name: accumulatedForces

classitems.description: Number of constraint relaxation loop iterations
classitems.name: _iterations

classitems.description: Alias for `Vec3.set`. Sets vector of `positions` and `positionsPrev`.
classitems.name: setPosition

classitems.description:
Calculate particle's next position through Verlet integration.
Called as part of `tick`.
classitems.name: integrate

classitems.description: Alias for `Collection.removeAll`. Remove all references to a constraint.
classitems.name: removeConstraint

classitems.description:
Add a pin constraint.
Although intended for instances of `PointConstraint`, this can be any
type of constraint and will be resolved last in the relaxation loop.
classitems.name: addPinConstraint

classitems.description: Alias for `Collection.removeAll`. Remove all references to a pin constraint.
classitems.name: removePinConstraint

classitems.description:
Run relaxation loop, resolving constraints per defined iterations.
Constraints are resolved in order by type: global, local, pin.
classitems.name: satisfyConstraints

params.name: count
params.description: Override for number of particles a constraint affects

classitems.description: Alias for `Collection.removeAll`. Remove all references to a force.
classitems.name: removeForce

classitems.description:
Step simulation forward one frame.
Applies forces, calculates particle positions, and resolves constraints.
classitems.name: tick

classitems.description: Remove all instances of an object from an array.
classitems.name: removeAll

params.name: Ctor
params.description: Constructor function used to instantiate class
